sentences.sContent: The bridegroom asked the guests to stand and then toasted the bridesmaids.
sentences.sCn: 新郎请客人起立为女傧相干杯.

sentences.sContent: The bride and bridegroom received their guests in the great hall.
sentences.sCn: 新娘和新郎在大厅迎接客人。

trans.tranOther: a man at the time he gets married, or just after he is married
